argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvzs.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvzs.3 | |- M = ( -v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvzs.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | nvzs.6 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> U e. NrmCVec ) |
| 6 | 1, 4 | #P_nvzcl | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> Z e. X ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> Z e. X ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> A e. X ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( +v ` U ) |
| 10 | 1, 9, 3, 2 | #P_nvmval | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ Z e. X /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z M A ) = ( Z ( +v ` U ) ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 7, 8, 10 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z M A ) = ( Z ( +v ` U ) ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 13 | 1, 3 | #P_nvscl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ -u 1 e. CC /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) |
| 15 | 1, 9, 4 | #P_nv0lid | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) -> ( Z ( +v ` U ) ( -u 1 S A ) ) = ( -u 1 S A ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z ( +v ` U ) ( -u 1 S A ) ) = ( -u 1 S A ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 16 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z M A ) = ( -u 1 S A ) ) |
